overview: July, 14th, 1789, then 1989 and its media coveraged bicentenary. Here a 16mm July 14th in order to wake up the sleepers and to tell them that the revolution is not only a party... This film has to be screened while assistants, projectionists, usherettes, cashiers, festivals directors, audience... throw big and little firecrackers everywhere in the room... regardless of safety rules, security rules... The filmmaker declines to be responsable for any possible accident. Watch out: explosive film.
title: 14 Juillet
